Package com.sr2.flopbox.service

Class ServerService

java.lang.Object
com.sr2.flopbox.service.ServerService
public final class ServerService
extends Object
Class Singleton which contains all the logic linked to the Server resource used to perform CRUD operations. All method are static because they are the same for every instance of the class
Author:
Adrien Holvoet

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Server createServer​(Server server)
    Create a server on the database(file)
    boolean deleteServer​(String alias)
    Synchronized method allowing only one thread to delete a server on the database(file).
    static ServerService getInstance()
    Static method to return the unique serverService instance, create it if it does not exist
    Server getServer​(String alias)
    Method used to return the server requested by the client based on its alias
    List<Server> getServers()
    Get all the servers registered on the FlopBox platform
    Server updateServer​(String alias, Server server)
    Synchronized method allowing only one thread to update a server on the database(file).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ServerService getInstance()
      Static method to return the unique serverService instance, create it if it does not exist
      Returns:
      instance a instance of ServerService

    • getServer

      public Server getServer​(String alias) throws IOException
      Method used to return the server requested by the client based on its alias
      Parameters:
      alias - used to get the server corresponding
      Returns:
      server
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error is raised when reading the file containing the servers
      jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException - if the server requested does not exist
      jakarta.ws.rs.BadRequestException - if the alias is null

    • getServers

      public List<Server> getServers() throws IOException
      Get all the servers registered on the FlopBox platform
      Returns:
      instance a instance of ServerService
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error is raised when reading the file containing the servers
      jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException - if the file is empty

    • createServer

      public Server createServer​(Server server) throws IOException
      Create a server on the database(file)
      Parameters:
      server - server to create
      Returns:
      instance a instance of ServerService
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error is raised when writing on the file containing the servers
      jakarta.ws.rs.BadRequestException - when the value sent by the client does not respect the expected format

    • updateServer

      public Server updateServer​(String alias, Server server) throws IOException
      Synchronized method allowing only one thread to update a server on the database(file). Like that it's sure that two people cannot update the same server à the same time(avoid conflict)
      Parameters:
      server - server to update
      alias - alias of the server to update
      Returns:
      server the server updated
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error is raised when writing on the file containing the servers
      jakarta.ws.rs.BadRequestException - when the value sent by the client does not respect the expected format
      jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException - if the server doesn't exist

    • deleteServer

      public boolean deleteServer​(String alias) throws IOException
      Synchronized method allowing only one thread to delete a server on the database(file). Like that it's sure that two people cannot delete the same server à the same time(avoid conflict)
      Parameters:
      alias - server to delete
      Returns:
      server the updated server
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error is raised when writing on the file containing the servers
      jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException - if the server doesn't exist
